page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: {The playgroup}is in Alkington Road.The Infants School is in Station Road,the Junior School is in Salisbury Road. The playgroup has swings and slides and inside there is a trampoline.The children are aged between 2 and 4 years.It is run by a lady called Mrs. Yeomans.10 to 15 children go there. {At the Infants School}they do topic work,practical maths,English,games and music.Most of the equipment is new including televisions,computers,gym, maths and record players.About 250 children go there,aged between five and seven years.The headmistress is Miss. Cartwright. {The Junior School}children do P.E.and sport,netball,rounders,swimming, cricket,football as well as class work and topic work.About 350 children, between 7 and 11 years,go there.The headmaster is Mr.Gillespie.
